NAEB HEADQUARTERS
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.Wi
Washington 6, D.C.
MEMORANDUM
TO: NAEB Board of Directors
FROM: Harold E. Hill
RE: Election of Board Chairman
Under the procedures established hy the Board, the Chairman of the full Boald
is elected by mail vote of the Board as soon as possible following the annual
election. The procedures specify that any member of the Board is eligible for
the chairmanship so long as he has served on the Board at least one year (and
there is no limit placed on the number of terms the Chairman of the full Board
can serve).
After the Chairman of the full Board is elected, the members of the Radio Board
and the Television Board will then be ashed to elect their respective chairmen.
Ihe men listed below are eligible to serve as Chairman of the full Board. Will
you please place an X in the proper space indicating the man for whom you wish
to vote and return this ballot to me so that it arrives not later than Wednesday,
December 19 (time is important so that we may elect the chairmen of the Radio
and TV Boards before the end of the year).
Albert Fredette
Hartford Gunn
Leonard Press
James Miles
Richard Hull
John Schwarzwalder
Burton Baulu
John Dunn
Ken Hager
